directions: Beat the mayonnaise, salsa, pineapple, 2 tablespoons of the reserved pineapple juice, and sugar together in a mixing bowl with an electric hand mixer on medium until well mixed, 1 to 2 minutes.
Chill in refrigerator at least 1 hour before serving.
ingredients: 1 (8 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained with juice reserved
title: Roasted Tomato Salsa and Sweet Pineapple Cream Dipping Sauce
